For a variety of reasons, the Trooper cannot benefit from the BS MODs for being in Partial Cover. 

{{css_skillbox |black| LIMITED COVER | AUTOMATIC SKILL }}
{{skill-label | Obligatory. }}

{{effects}}
* Attacks against this Trooper do '''not''' apply the''' -3 [[BS]] MOD for [[Partial Cover]]'''.
{{css_skillbox-end}}


{{advice-start}}
Keep in mind that the most severe restriction always applies. If a '''[[No Cover]]''' Trooper also has '''[[Limited Cover]]''' due to another rule or Skill, the No Cover Skill will still apply.
{{advice-end}}
